description:
Login to the websiste using the following credentialss
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Verify that user lands on the home page

steps.stepDescription: Open the web browser and navigate to http://localhost:3005
Enter test_user_name in the username field on the login page
Enter test_password in the password field on the login page
Click the Login button to authenticate the user
Verify that the user lands on the home page and the banner image is visible
